content: p2tog using 1 st from each side of the gap toe p1 turn set up round k 30 34 38 pm k to end of repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been round worked round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker you will have 18 20 22 sts on your needle k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of and the rs should be facing you round k2tog gusset round 2 k to end of round now you are going to start working in the repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 24 32 round again 40 sts left set up round this will be your bor place a cut your working yarn leaving a tail of marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break can kitchener stitch your toe closed contrast yarn and start working with main colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pm k 2 4 6 work row 1 of right/left rosie pattern k 2 4 6 pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder 3 rosie socks by debbie ford abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together knit knit k tbl knit through back loop purl purl ssk slip slip knit pm place marker bor beginning of round sm slip marker 2/2 lc slip next 2 stitches to cable needle and place at front of work k2 then k2 from cable needle 3/3 lc slip next 3 stitches to cable needle and place at front of work k3 then k3 from cable needle 4/4 lc slip next 4 stitches to cable needle and place at front of work k4 then k4 from cable needle 2/2 rc slip next 2 stitches to cable needle and place at back of work k2 then k2 from cable needle 3/3 rc slip next 3 stitches to cable needle and place at back of work k3 then k3 from cable needle 4/4 rc slip next 4 stitches to cable needle and place at back of work k4 then k4 from cable needle left rosie chart right rosie chart 4 rosie socks by debbie ford written instructions left rosie pattern right rosie pattern row 1 - 2 p2 k4 p2 k6 p2 k8 p2 26 sts row 1 - 2 p2 k8 p2 k6 p2 k4 p2 26 sts row 3 p2 2/2 lc p2 k6 p2 k8 p2 row 3 p2 k8 p2 k6 p2 2/2 rc p2 row 4 repeat round 1 row 4 repeat round 1 row 5 p2 k4 p2 3/3 lc p2 k8 p2 row 5 p2 k8 p2 3/3 rc p2 k4 p2 row 6 repeat round 1 row 6 repeat round 1 row 7 p2 k4 p2 k6 p2 4/4 lc p2 row 7 p2 4/4 rc p2 k6 p2 k4 p2 thanks to polly
